overview: Lilly Lit cautiously peeks her head in through a bedroom door. She always wondered what Cadence Lux keeps stashed around there she constantly hears her moaning through the walls at night. Darcie Dolce and Adria Rae are making out when Adria's phone starts ringing. Picking it up, they see a picture from their respective moms together. Did their moms get married without telling their daughters? When Katie Morgan introduces her stepsister to Chanell Heart, she's a little confused as to why she's referring to her as her partner. Chanell and Jenna retreat to their bedroom and they start making out. What they don't know is that Jenna is watching them. Jade Baker really appreciates April O'Neil and her husband letting her stay there. She can stay as long as she needs to, April tells her patiently. Besides, it will be great to have a woman around the house for a change, April adds with a laugh. Maybe now she can finally get some REAL advice on what to wear.
title: In Bed With My Stepsister
